db:select.db:sql: Select t1.orderId, t2.placementDate, t2.customerID, t2.status, t2.totalPrice, t1.orderItemId, t1.itemId, t1.itemCount, t1.price, t1.itemName from orderItems t1 INNER JOIN orderMaster t2 on t1.orderId=t2.orderId where t1.orderId=:orderID

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- (payload groupBy $.orderID) pluck(v,k,i) -> { orderID: v.orderId[0] as Number default 0, placementDate: v.placementDate[0] default "", customerId: v.customerID[0] default 0, status: v.status[0] default "", totalPrice: v.totalPrice[0] default 0, orderItem:v map(x,y)-> { itemId: x.itemId as Number default 0, itemName: x.itemName default "", price: x.price default 0, quantity: x.itemCount default 0 } }
